channel.title: All About Everything
channel.itunes:subtitle: A show about everything
channel.itunes:author: John Doe
channel.itunes:summary: All About Everything is a show about everything. Each week we dive into any subject known to man and talk about it as much as we can. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Store
channel.description: All About Everything is a show about everything. Each week we dive into any subject known to man and talk about it as much as we can. Look for our Podcast in the iTunes Store
